N = int(input())
L = list(map(int,input().split()))

L.sort(reverse=True)

if L[0] < sum(L[1:]):
    print('Yes')
else:
    print('No')

N = int(input())
L = list(map(int,input().split()))
L.sort()

if L[N-1] < sum(L[:N-1]):
    print("Yes")
else:
    print("No")

def main():
    n = int(input())
    ls = list(map(int, input().split()))
    ls.sort(reverse=True)
    print('Yes' if ls[0] < sum(ls[1:]) else 'No')


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

n = int(input())
l = list(map(int,input().split()))
l.sort()
if l[-1] < sum(l[0:n-1]):
    print('Yes')
else:
    print('No')

N = int(input())
L = list(map(int, input().split()))

L_max = max(L)
L.remove(L_max)

if L_max < sum(L):
    print('Yes')
else:
    print('No')
